Name: Annual Mean Temperature
Description: Mean value of monthly temperature across the year

Name: Annual Temperature Variance
Description: Variance in temperature means (averaged across years)

Name: Temperature Constancy
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable because conditions are constant. Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Temperature Contingency
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable because conditions oscillate in a very predictable manner.  Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Temperature Predictability
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable due to either constancy or contingency.  Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Monthly Mean Precipitation
Description: Mean value of monthly precipitation across the year

Name: Monthly Precipitation Variance
Description: Variance in monthly precipitation means (averaged across years)

Name: Precipitation Constancy
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable because conditions are constant. Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Precipitation Contingency
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable because conditions oscillate in a very predictable manner.  Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Precipitation Predictability
Description: Colwell's (1974) information theoretic index. Indicates the extent to which a climate patterns are predictable due to either constancy or contingency.  Varies between 0 (completely unpredictable) and 1 (fully predictable).

Name: Bird Richness
Description: Number of coexisting bird species.

Name: Mammal Richness
Description: Number of coexisting mammal species.

Name: Amphibian Richness
Description: Number of coexisting amphibian species.

Name: Vascular Plants Richness
Description: Number of coexisting vascular plant species.

Name: Elevation
Description: Meters above sea level

Name: Slope
Description: Mean incline (in degrees) in the terrain (unit of sample 0.5 by 0.5 degree cell)

Name: Coastal
Description: Location is <50 km from a major waterbody

Name: Net Primary Production
Description: Net primary production per year (grams of carbon uptake per square meter of land per day)

Name: Duration Of Growing Season
Description: Mean number of months in the year that net primary production is positive

Name: Mean Growing Season NPP
Description: Mean net primary production during growing seaso (variance in grams of carbon uptake per square meter of land per day of growing season)

Name: Inter-Year Variance Growing Season NPP
Description: Variance among years in NPP for the growing season

Name: EcoRegion
Description: Classification by Olson et al. (2001) of the earth into large units or “ecoregions” containing geographically distinct assemblages of species, natural communities, and environmental conditions.
